document_data.caption: A map of the western half of Skuldask Road. Click to enlarge.
document_data.name: Skuldask Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Skuldask Road''' was a moderately traveled trade road in the [[Western Heartlands]] of [[Faer√ªn]]. It branched off of [[Thundar's Ride]] near the center of the [[Fields of the Dead]] and stretched east-southeast to [[Elturel]]. Below Elturel it crossed the [[River Chionthar]] and continued southeast until it met the [[Uldoon Trail]] just below [[Berdusk]].
